item.title: Kits And Pack Orphans First [Fiction]
item.description: ALTERNATIVE TITLE: Offworld Pack Orphan NOTES: The message delay is 8 minutes ROUND TRIP, that means the wormhole is 4 light minutes away, or 3.5 light minutes away from the L2 point. This means it takes 17.5 minutes at 20% speed of light, or 20 minutes at 17% the speed of light for the round to reach the station. Having it at the L2 point would also make aiming easier.
